LC50; Species: Bufo americanus (American toad, tadpole); Conditions: static, 20-24 °C, pH 7.6-8.1, hardness 90-115 mg/L; Concentration: 2.71 ug/L (95% Confidence Levels: 1.91-3.75 mg/L); Exposure was initiated 2-6 hr after spawning and continued to 4 days post-hatching. Hatching times varied between 3 and 4 days, therefore, exposure varied between 7 and 8 days.
